terms.title: Matcha! System ‚Äî Terms of Service
terms.body:
Preamble
Welcome to Matcha!, the social infrastructure powering your Butter Launcher experience. By registering an account, accessing the platform, or utilizing our communication services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and unconditionally agree to be bound by the following Terms of Service ("Terms").

1. Account Security & Registration
1.1. Account Identity
Your user profile is distinctively identified by a username combined with a numeric discriminator (e.g., User#0000). You acknowledge that you are the sole authorized user of your account and are fully responsible for all activities, actions, and communications that occur under your credentials.

1.2. Credential Protection
While Matcha! employs industry-standard encryption protocols to protect your data, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login credentials. Matcha! assumes no liability for any loss or damage arising from unauthorized access attributable to your failure to secure your password.

1.3. Registration Constraints
To ensure service integrity and prevent abuse, account creation is strictly limited to five (5) new accounts per IP address within a 24-hour period. Any attempt to circumvent this restriction‚Äîincluding but not limited to the use of VPNs, proxies, or IP spoofing‚Äî constitutes a violation of these Terms and may result in a permanent ban.

2. User Conduct & Acceptable Use
2.1. Automated Content Filtering
The platform utilizes automated filtering systems to maintain community standards. Any deliberate attempt to bypass these filters (e.g., through the use of "leet speak," special characters, or misspelling) is strictly prohibited and will result in immediate administrative action.

2.2. Anti-Spam & Automation
To prevent service disruption, we enforce strict rate limits on message transmission. The use of bots, macros, scripts, or any third-party software to automate interactions or "flood" the chat service is prohibited.

2.3. Prohibited Content
We maintain a zero-tolerance policy regarding:

Hate speech and discriminatory language.

Threats of violence or harm.

Doxing (the unauthorized publication of private or identifying information).

Harassment or bullying in any form.

3. Data Privacy & Processing
3.1. Message Retention
By using the service, you consent to the processing and storage of your communications (including Global Chat and Direct Messages) on our servers. This data retention is necessary to facilitate message history synchronization across user sessions.

3.2. Connection Logging
For the purposes of security, auditing, and moderation, you acknowledge that we log specific connection data, including the IP address utilized at the time of registration and the IP address associated with your most recent connection.

4. Limitation of Liability & Disclaimer
PLEASE READ THIS SECTION CAREFULLY.

4.1. User Interactions
Matcha! and its administrators act solely as a conduit for communication. We are not responsible for, nor do we arbitrate, disputes, conflicts, or agreements between users. You assume full responsibility for your interactions with other account holders.

4.2. Third-Party Content
We disclaim all liability regarding external links, files, or media shared by users within Global Chat or Direct Messages. Accessing third-party content is done entirely at your own risk.

4.3. Limitation of Damages
To the fullest extent permitted by law, the creators, operators, and affiliates of Matcha! shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the service. This includes, without limitation, damages for emotional distress, loss of data, or damages resulting from fraudulent actions by other users.

4.4. "As Is" Service
The platform is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted service and are not liable for data loss or message delivery failures caused by technical malfunctions, maintenance, or server restarts.

5. Moderation & Termination
The System Administrators reserve the exclusive right, at their sole discretion and without prior notice, to:

Remove or obscure content deemed inappropriate or in violation of these Terms.

Unilaterally modify usernames that are offensive or violate community standards.

Suspend, restrict, or permanently terminate any account found to be in violation of these Terms or that poses a threat to the security or safety of the community.

friendsMenu.scrollUp: Scroll up to load older messages.

proof.uniqueIdHint: Copy and save this B-Matcha Secure Key (starts with BM:). It is shown only once and is required to prove account ownership for support requests (delete account, rename, or password reset). Do not share it with anyone except official Butter/Matcha support.
proof.finalCheckBody: To confirm you read the above and understand the importance of not losing your B-Matcha Secure Key, enter it here:
proof.finalCheckError: That B-Matcha Secure Key is incorrect.

register.handleHint: Your full handle (with #) will be shown after creating the account.

descriptions.threats_violence: Threats, incitement to violence, or content that promotes physical harm to yourself or others.
descriptions.bullying: Harassment, intimidation, humiliation, or repeated personal attacks toward a user.
descriptions.doxxing: Sharing personal information without permission (address, phone, accounts, private photos, etc.).
descriptions.hate_speech: Offensive or discriminatory content targeting race, ethnicity, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, gender, disability, or other characteristics.
descriptions.sexual_nsfw: Explicit sexual content, unwanted sexual advances, or NSFW material.
descriptions.spam_ads: Repetitive messages, flooding, unsolicited advertising, or irrelevant links.
descriptions.phishing: Attempts to steal accounts/passwords, malicious links, or impersonation/scams.

hostServerModal.title: HOST A SERVER
hostServerModal.description: This menu will help you configure and host a server (port, mods, version, and start/stop controls).
hostServerModal.placeholder: Placeholder UI only ‚Äî no hosting logic wired yet.

warning.title: Host a Server
warning.versionLine: The server will start using the currently selected version in the launcher: {{version}}.
warning.folderSyncMessage: Remember: loading a new {{target}} folder will replace the current one.

errors.buildNotInstalled:
You must install the selected build before hosting a local server.
Selected: {{version}}
errors.java25Required: Java 25 is required to host a server. We recommend Adoptium (Temurin): https://adoptium.net/temurin/releases
errors.javaTooOld: Your Java version is {{found}}. Java 25 is required to host a server. We recommend Adoptium (Temurin): https://adoptium.net/temurin/releases
errors.customAssetsMissing: Select a .zip file for Custom Assets, or disable Custom Assets.
errors.assetsZipMissing: The selected assets .zip does not exist: {{path}}
errors.folderSyncRunning: Stop the server before replacing Universe/Mods/Early Plugins.
errors.folderSyncFailed: Failed to copy the selected folder into the server.
errors.folderSourceMissing: The selected folder does not exist: {{path}}
errors.ramMissing: Set both RAM values (Min and Max) when RAM is enabled.
errors.ramInvalid: RAM values must be positive numbers.
errors.ramRange: Max RAM cannot be less than Min RAM.
errors.commandFailed: Failed to send command to the server.

console.title: Server Console
console.commandPlaceholder: Type a command and press Enter...

localHost.note: Note: Requires port forwarding on your router and keeping your PC turned on so others can join; alternatively, Radmin/Hamachi or similar apps will be required to allow other users to play.

proHosting.button: Host, buy, or create your 24/7 server

errors.unavailable: Mods are unavailable right now. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.serviceUnreachable: We couldn't reach the mods service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.downloadFailed: Download failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.unknown: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.modNotManaged: Mod is not managed by the launcher.
errors.attachFileNotFound: That file was not found in your Mods folder.
errors.modNotFoundFromLink: We couldn't find that mod from the provided link. Expected format: {{example}}

details.selectModForDetails: Select a mod to view details.

installed.attachErrorFileNotFound: That file was not found in your Mods folder.
installed.attachErrorModNotFound: We couldn't find that mod from the provided link. Expected format: {{example}}
installed.attachErrorService: We couldn't reach the mods service. Please check your internet connection and try again.
installed.deleteConfirmMsg: This will permanently delete {{name}} from your Mods folder. Continue?

This will restore the original client/server and delete patched artifacts.
